title: ISic020446. ISic020446
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΡΧΕ..Ο̄ΕΙΜΙΤΟΕΥΚΕΟΣ  ←

l.1 reg., orig. ΕΥΚΕΟΣΕὐκέος

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena 1989 (IGASM I). ;
  • Heldring reads ΑΡΧ[..]Ο and suggests Ἀρχέλαος or Ἀρχέβιος.

English translation

I am (the lekanis) of Archetios (son) of Eukleos.

Italian translation

Sono (la lekanis) di Archetios (figlio) di Eukleos.

commentary

Inscription of possession in which the owner's name is, according to Arena (1989), an hypocoristic from Ἀρχέτιμος, such as Ἀρχετίων, Ἄρχετος, etc. Εὐκέος stands for Εὐκε͂ς with the loss of lambda in the κλ nexus.

bibliography

  • Arena 1989 58 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000638
  • Heldring 1979 29-33 (ph) https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001443
  • Ferri 1968 267-268, figs.7-8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002573
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
